# Security policy

## Reporting a vulnerability

Please do not report vulnerabilities via public issues. Contact us privately at:

- kral.petr.88@gmail.com
- petr@ecomail.cz

## What to expect

- We will acknowledge your report and respond within a reasonable time.
- For valid vulnerabilities: we will work on a fix and coordinate disclosure (e.g. release and release notes).

## Supported versions

Security updates are provided for currently supported versions:

- PHP 8.4+
- Laravel 12.x

Package versions: see [README](README.md) and [releases](https://github.com/Ecomailcz/laravel-gosms-client/releases).
